alert.note: Alert for Madison (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 14 at 5:18AM CDT until August 14 at 6:00AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is occurring. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Missouri, including the following counties, Iron and Madison. * WHEN...Until 1115 AM CDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 516 AM CDT, local law enforcement reported flooding in the warned area. Flooding is already occurring. Between 3 and 6 inches of rain have fallen. - The Madison County Sheriff Department reported flooding along Highway 67 in southern Madison County. Flooding was also reported along Highway C in the vicinity of Madison 433. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Annapolis, Marquand, Saco, Buckhorn, Glover, Des Arc, Vulcan, Sabula and Chloride.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
